rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reception area integrating local materials and Brutalist design elements. Features a water feature for acoustics.
Open living space with exposed concrete structures and natural light, connected to garden views and pool access. Designed following Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Functional kitchen with modern amenities integrated into the Brutalist aesthetic, positioned according to Vastu principles (south-west).
Adjacent dining area merging with living space, offering a direct view of the garden.

openings.description: Large entrance door complementing the Brutalist style with a modern twist.
Large windows for natural lighting and garden views.
Open balcony providing access to the swimming pool area below and garden.
